Name: Charles
description:
Charles is happily married and has been blessed with two children who depend on him. He runs a grocery business, using his motorbike to supply fresh organic vegetables and fruits to his customers.

He is seeking a loan to enable him to service his motorbike and buy more groceries for selling. He would also like to add employees to his business.

His dream for the future is to educate his children and expand his business in order to lift the standard of living for his family.
